skill.name: brand-guidelines
skill.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit from having Anthropic's look-and-feel. Use it when brand colors or style guidelines, visual formatting, or company design standards apply.
skill.summary: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit fr...
skill.author: ArtemisAI

security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-based documentation skill containing only brand guidelines and color specifications. No executable code, network calls, file system access, or environment variable reads are present. Safe to use.

content.value_statement: Create documents and artifacts that match Anthropic's visual identity. Apply official brand colors and typography consistently.
actual_capabilities: Apply Anthropic brand colors to documents
Apply Poppins font to headings (24pt and larger)
Apply Lora font to body text
Use accent colors (orange, blue, green) for shapes
limitations: Requires font installation for full typography support
Works only with supported document formats
Cannot generate new content, only applies styling
Does not include brand assets or logos

use_cases.title: Format presentation decks
use_cases.description: Apply consistent Anthropic branding to PowerPoint and slide decks

use_cases.title: Maintain brand consistency
use_cases.description: Ensure all team outputs follow official visual identity guidelines

use_cases.title: Style technical documents
use_cases.description: Apply brand colors and typography to reports and documentation

prompt_templates.title: Basic styling
prompt_templates.scenario: Apply brand styling to a document
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic brand guidelines to this document. Use dark (#141413) for text on light backgrounds and light (#faf9f5) for backgrounds. Apply Poppins font to headings and Lora font to body text.

prompt_templates.title: Color palette
prompt_templates.prompt: Use these Anthropic brand colors: Dark #141413, Light #faf9f5, Mid Gray #b0aea5, Light Gray #e8e6dc. Accents: Orange #d97757, Blue #6a9bcc, Green #788c5d.

prompt_templates.title: Typography focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic typography guidelines. Headings use Poppins font with Arial fallback. Body text uses Lora font with Georgia fallback. Use 24pt or larger for heading font size.

prompt_templates.title: Full brand application
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply full Anthropic brand identity: colors (dark #141413, light #faf9f5, accents #d97757, #6a9bcc, #788c5d), typography (Poppins headings, Lora body), and smart fallbacks. Ensure visual hierarchy is preserved.

output_examples.input: Style this document with Anthropic brand guidelines
output: Applied dark (#141413) as primary text color
Used Poppins font for all headings 24pt and larger
Applied Lora font to body text paragraphs
Used accent orange (#d97757) for callout boxes
Fallback fonts ready: Arial for headings, Georgia for body

best_practices: Pre-install Poppins and Lora fonts for best typography results
Use the complete color palette including accent colors for visual interest
Test document rendering on different systems to verify font fallbacks
anti_patterns: Using non-brand colors alongside brand colors creates visual inconsistency
Applying heading font size below 24pt weakens visual hierarchy
Ignoring the smart color selection based on background contrast

faq.question: Which document formats support this skill?
faq.answer: The skill works with formats supported by the python-pptx library and other document tools that accept RGB color values.

faq.question: What happens if fonts are not installed?
faq.answer: The skill provides automatic fallback to Arial for headings and Georgia for body text to maintain readability.

faq.question: Can I use this skill with other brand colors?
faq.answer: The skill is specifically designed for Anthropic brand guidelines. For other brands, a separate skill would be needed.

faq.question: Does this skill send data to external servers?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-based skill with no network capabilities. All styling is applied locally.

faq.question: Why do my colors look different on another system?
faq.answer: Ensure RGB color values are used consistently. Different displays may show colors slightly differently due to calibration.

faq.question: How is this skill different from other styling tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides official Anthropic brand specifications including exact color values and typography guidelines in one place.
